name: Petrified Forests
description: Ancient forests turned to stone create unique landscapes and valuable materials. The stone wood can be harvested for building or crafting, while the preservation process can indicate ancient magical or natural cataclysms.
atmosphere: Ancient forests turned to stone create surreal landscapes while perfectly preserved tree structures record prehistoric ecosystems. The mineralized wood displays growth rings and bark texture as geological processes created accidental sculpture gardens. Time frozen in stone and crystal.
